TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CorrelationAliasAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class CorrelationAliasAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class CorrelationAliasAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 當相互關聯值必須從不是由 所指定的參數中取得時，則覆寫相互關聯參數值。

span.span: Overrides the correlation parameter value when the correlation value must be obtained from a parameter other than that indicated by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 為了比對傳入訊息與適當的工作流程執行個體，訊息和工作流程執行個體必須共用索引鍵。To match an incoming message with the appropriate workflow instance, the message and the workflow instance must share a key. 這個索引鍵稱做相互關聯集。This key is called a correlation set. 一般而言，這個索引鍵可以是單一值的相互關聯集。Typically, the key can be a single-valued correlation set. 這表示訊息中的某個 ID 欄位可與由排程執行個體所保有之相同型別的 ID 比對。This means that an ID field in the message can be matched against an ID of the same type that is held by schedule instances. 會套用至資料交換介面上介面中的方法或事件。The is applied to a method or an event on an interface on a data exchange interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 來覆寫 。The following code example shows how to use a to override a . 這個程式碼範例來自＜CorrelatedLocalService SDK＞範例。This code example is from the CorrelatedLocalService SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[相互關聯本機服務範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd)。For more information, see [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#312](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets38.cs#312)]
